dk.statsbiblioteket.util.rpc
Class ConnectionContext<E>

java.lang.Object
  dk.statsbiblioteket.util.rpc.ConnectionContext<E>

public class ConnectionContext<E>
extends java.lang.Object

A thread safe reference counted object wrapping a connection of type E.

See Also:
ConnectionManager

Method Summary
 E getConnection()
          Get the connection wrapped by this context
 java.lang.String getConnectionId()
          Get the connectionId as passed to the constructor.

          Get the refernce count for this context - only for debugging!

Method Detail

ref

public ConnectionContext<E> ref()
Grab a reference to a ConnectionContext. Contexts obtained via ConnectionManager.get(java.lang.String) are already referenced. You should only use this method if you obtain a ConnectionContext by other means.

Returns:
the referenced context

unref

public void unref()
Release a reference to a ConnectionContext. This is equivalent to calling ConnectionManager.release(dk.statsbiblioteket.util.rpc.ConnectionContext).

getConnectionId

public java.lang.String getConnectionId()
Get the connectionId as passed to the constructor.

Returns:

getRefCount

public int getRefCount()
Get the refernce count for this context - only for debugging!

Returns:

getConnection

public E getConnection()
Get the connection wrapped by this context

Returns:
the connection wrapped by this context
